Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.springframework.core.JdkVersion
    as of Spring 4.2.1, in favor of direct checks for the desired JDK API variants via reflection
    org.springframework.util.Log4jConfigurer
    as of Spring 4.2.1, in favor of Apache Log4j 2 (following Apache's EOL declaration for log4j 1.x)
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.springframework.core.io.support.PathMatchingResourcePatternResolver.doFindPathMatchingJarResources(Resource, String)
    as of Spring 4.3, in favor of PathMatchingResourcePatternResolver.doFindPathMatchingJarResources(Resource, URL, String)
    org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotatedElementUtils.findMergedAnnotation(AnnotatedElement, String)
    As of Spring Framework 4.2.3, use AnnotatedElementUtils.findMergedAnnotation(AnnotatedElement, Class) instead.
    org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotationAttributes.getAliasedClassArray(String, Class<? extends Annotation>, Object)
    as of Spring 4.3.2, in favor of built-in alias resolution in AnnotationAttributes.getClassArray(java.lang.String) itself
    org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotationAttributes.getAliasedString(String, Class<? extends Annotation>, Object)
    as of Spring 4.3.2, in favor of built-in alias resolution in AnnotationAttributes.getString(java.lang.String) itself
    org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotationAttributes.getAliasedStringArray(String, Class<? extends Annotation>, Object)
    as of Spring 4.3.2, in favor of built-in alias resolution in AnnotationAttributes.getStringArray(java.lang.String) itself
    org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotatedElementUtils.getAnnotationAttributes(AnnotatedElement, String)
    As of Spring Framework 4.2, use AnnotatedElementUtils.getMergedAnnotationAttributes(AnnotatedElement, String) instead.
    org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotatedElementUtils.getAnnotationAttributes(AnnotatedElement, String, boolean, boolean)
    As of Spring Framework 4.2, use AnnotatedElementUtils.getMergedAnnotationAttributes(AnnotatedElement, String, boolean, boolean) instead.
    org.springframework.util.MimeType.getCharSet()
    as of Spring 4.3, in favor of MimeType.getCharset() with its name aligned with the Java return type name
    org.springframework.core.GenericCollectionTypeResolver.getCollectionFieldType(Field, int, Map<Integer, Integer>)
    as of 4.0, in favor of using ResolvableType for arbitrary nesting levels
    org.springframework.core.GenericCollectionTypeResolver.getMapKeyFieldType(Field, int, Map<Integer, Integer>)
    as of 4.0, in favor of using ResolvableType for arbitrary nesting levels
    org.springframework.core.GenericCollectionTypeResolver.getMapValueFieldType(Field, int, Map<Integer, Integer>)
    as of 4.0, in favor of using ResolvableType for arbitrary nesting levels
    org.springframework.core.env.AbstractPropertyResolver.getPropertyAsClass(String, Class<T>)
    org.springframework.core.env.PropertySourcesPropertyResolver.getPropertyAsClass(String, Class<T>)
    org.springframework.core.env.PropertyResolver.getPropertyAsClass(String, Class<T>)
    as of 4.3, in favor of PropertyResolver.getProperty(java.lang.String) with manual conversion to Class via the application's ClassLoader
    org.springframework.core.env.AbstractEnvironment.getPropertyAsClass(String, Class<T>)
    org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotationUtils.getRepeatableAnnotation(AnnotatedElement, Class<? extends Annotation>, Class<A>)
    As of Spring Framework 4.2, use getRepeatableAnnotations() or getDeclaredRepeatableAnnotations() instead.
    org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotationUtils.getRepeatableAnnotation(Method, Class<? extends Annotation>, Class<A>)
    As of Spring Framework 4.2, use getRepeatableAnnotations() or getDeclaredRepeatableAnnotations() instead.
    org.springframework.core.GenericTypeResolver.getTargetType(MethodParameter)
    as of Spring 4.0, use MethodParameter.getGenericParameterType()
    org.springframework.core.GenericTypeResolver.getTypeVariableMap(Class<?>)
    as of Spring 4.0 in favor of ResolvableType
    org.springframework.asm.ClassWriter.newHandle(int, String, String, String)
    this method is superseded by ClassWriter.newHandle(int, String, String, String, boolean).
    org.springframework.core.GenericTypeResolver.resolveType(Type, Map<TypeVariable, Type>)
    as of Spring 4.0 in favor of ResolvableType
    org.springframework.asm.MethodVisitor.visitMethodInsn(int, String, String, String)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.springframework.asm.Handle(int, String, String, String)
    this constructor has been superseded by Handle.Handle(int, String, String, String, boolean).
